row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH#/&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#/snap.xml" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &SNAPSHOT_FILE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_JAVA_TOOL
port=$(java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#websphere-tool.jar XML GetAttribute -xml "&SNAPSHOT_FILE#" -x //snapshot -an 'port' -filter first | grep "XML-GetAttribute-Result") :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
port=$(echo $port | sed 's/XML-GetAttribute-Result: \[\(.*\)\]$/\1/') :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
host=$(java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#websphere-tool.jar XML GetAttribute -xml "&SNAPSHOT_FILE#" -x //snapshot -an 'host' -filter first | grep "XML-GetAttribute-Result") :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
host=$(echo $host | sed 's/XML-GetAttribute-Result: \[\(.*\)\]$/\1/') :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
echo "Websphere: $host :: $port"
application=$(java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#websphere-tool.jar XML ExecutePath -xml "&SNAPSHOT_FILE#" -x //snapshot/application -filter first | grep "Return code: 0")
server=$(java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#websphere-tool.jar XML ExecutePath -xml "&SNAPSHOT_FILE#" -x //snapshot/server -filter first | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$application" ] ; then if [ -n "$server" ] ; then echo "SnapMode: BOTH" else echo "SnapMode: APPLICATION" fi else if [ -n "$server" ] ; then echo "SnapMode: SERVER" else echo "Unable to extract information from &SNAPSHOT_FILE#" exit 1 fi fi
appname=$(java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#websphere-tool.jar XML GetAttribute -xml "&SNAPSHOT_FILE#" -x //snapshot/application/appname -an 'name' -filter first | grep "XML-GetAttribute-Result")
appname=$(echo $appname | sed 's/XML-GetAttribute-Result: \[\(.*\)\]$/\1/')
echo "AppName: $appname"

row.post_process:
:SET &checkForText# = "Websphere:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 12 : SET &UC4RB_RESULT_SNAP_XML# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,12) : DEFINE &host_port#, string, 2 : FILL &host_port#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_RESULT_SNAP_XML#,"::") : PSET &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# = STR_TRIM(&host_port#[1]) : PSET &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# = STR_TRIM(&host_port#[2])
:ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "SnapMode:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 11 : PSET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_MODE# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,11) :ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "AppName:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 10 : PSET &UC4RB_APP_NAME# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,10) :ENDIF
